title: When Was the First Alligator Found in the Chicago River?
subtitle: Rumor has it that an alligator discovered in the Chicago River in June 2008 was the first ever found in that body of water. Let's look a little deeper.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: An alligator captured in the Chicago River in June 2008 was the first such creature ever found in that body of water.
